moves.4... Bd7: This seems like an odd move.
moves.5. Nf3 Be7: Equally good are Qb6, Nc6 and Nh6, and some of these may transpose.
moves.6. a3 Nh6 7. d4 Nf5 8. Bd3 O-O: Qb6, a5, c4 and Nc6 are viable alternatives.
moves.9. Kf2: Castling is the better move.  It remains to be seems though if black can exploit the position of the king, which for now looks perfectly safe.
moves.13. h3:
White neglects his development. 
 13. Nbd2 was better.
moves.15... axb4 16. axb4:
Because white keeps making poor choices, he is now lost.
 16. cxb4 Is better.
